features: 【Mini Foldable Washing Machine】The Portable washer machine is 11.8 x 11.8 x 11.8 inches large when unfolded and 11.8 x 11.8 x 4.9 inches small when folded. Only 3.5 lbs, compact and easy to carry and store, it can be easily placed between shelves or under the bed without taking up too much space in your home.

【Powerful Cleaning Mini Washer】 The portable washing machine provides all-round imitation hand scrubbing, suitable washing speed, and strong decontamination. The blue light disinfection makes it suitable for washing delicate garments like baby clothes, underwear, socks and other small cloth. (Please note: Not suitable for jeans, long skirts, bathrobes, and larger clothing items)

【Easy to use】The mini foldable washing mechine is design in 3 modes, 1 minutes for quick cleaning or draining, 5 minutes for standard washing, 10 minutes for powerful cleaning. Easy to operate, easy to carrry.

【Washing and Draining 2-in-1】This mini washer is design with washing and draining function, install the basket for draining after washing finished. This foldable washing machine used less water and detergent compared to traditional washing machine, you can save money on water bills, it's eco-friendly and cost-effective.

【High Quality Material】 The portable washer is made of TPE and food-grade silicone material, taking care the health of your family! It's portable enough to carrying while on business travel, camping etc. Besides, the mini washer is quite usefull when you just want to wash 1 coloth, such as white T-shirt.
body.description: Mini Portable Washing Machine Portable washer machine is the perfect helper for washing your personal clothes and baby clothes.Mini folding washing machine is specially designed for socks/underwear/baby clothes.Foldable washing machine can help you wash small clothes, no longer need to wash by hand, making the clothes cleaner and gives the baby the greatest care.Product Specifications: Washing Time: 1min/5mins/10minsRated Voltage: 110-240VRated Power: 36WCapacity: 8LWeight: 1.8kg/3.9LBMaterial: Food grade TPE+PPFolded Size: 11*11*4.9 inchesColor: GreenPackage Includes: Portable folding washing machine * 1 Drain basket * 1 U.S. plug * 1 Instruction manual * 1 Drain pipe*1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had hoped this would cut down on the amount of laundry I would have to take to the laundromat, but the instructions only told how to set it up, but not how to use it. No instructions on how to add the water or how much. Nor did it say anything about the amount of detergent to use. I have never used or even seen one used before so it would have been nice to get full instructions to someone under those conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't hold more than a shirt, a pair of underwear and a pair of socks but, does it work and save on time. Next best thing to having your own full-size.
